ingredients.ingredient: 18 fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded
1 (5.25 ounce) package frozen vegetarian bacon strips, thawed

cookingTips: Ensure cream cheese is soft enough to pipe or easily spread into jalapeno halves
Wrap each filled jalapeno with vegetarian bacon and secure with a toothpick for stability during cooking
Bake at 375Â°F for 18-22 minutes until bacon is crispy and jalapenos are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you secure the bacon around the filled jalapenos so it doesn't slip during cooking?
